price: Hakika wachamngu watakuwa katika Mabustani na neema,
footnotes: Hakika wachamngu watakuwa katika Mabustani yenye wasaa, hapana awezae kuyaeleza yalivyo, na neema kubwa kadhaalika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
